name: Medium Rare (itch)
description:
A Game about running a restaurant  that's been taken over by ghosts!

During the Mourning shift you will be tasked with making orders for hungry customers, until you close for the night. Then the player will have to appease hungry ravenous specters to make it through the night.

Currently we only have the Mourning shift implemented and there are a few bugs, but in the next update we will have the Graveyard shift introduced!    


Please take our quick questionnaire! https://forms.gle/JLMmiCrPkeW17VNf8
